text: Ocyroe is a genus created by Philippi, and related to Chiliotrichum group. Phylogenetics of the Chiliotrichum Group (Compositae: Astereae): The Story of the Fascinating Radiation in the Paleate Astereae Genera From Southern South America Taxon 61 ==Taxa== O armata (Wedd.) Bonifacino (syn.Nardophyllum armatum ReicheRodríguez et al. 2018 Catálogo) Category:Asteraceae
title: Ocyroe
